title: Shane Told from Silverstein
itunes:title: Shane Told from Silverstein
description:
This week I speak to my old friend and vocalist for the band Silverstein, Shane Told. For as long as I have known him, there were many things that I simply had no clue he experienced. We discuss managing expectations, his own identity and neglecting Canada at the beginning of the bands career. It's an incredibly open and honest discussion that I was glad Shane decided to have with me. THIS IS OUR FUNDRAISING MONTH. IF YOU LIKE WHAT YOU HEAR, OR ARE A REGULAR LISTENER PLEASE CONSIDER DONATING. EVEN $1 A MONTH HELPS. MONTHLY DONATIONONE TIME DONATION

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
